ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: And remind them, for truly the muminun benefit from being reminded.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But go on reminding them, as reminding benefits the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Do, however, keep exhorting them; for exhortation benefits those endowed with faith.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Keep on reminding them. This benefits the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And advise, for advice benefits the Muslims.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And remind, for verily, the reminding profits the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And continue to remind, for surely the reminder profits the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And remind; the Reminder profits the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And warn, for warning profiteth believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: but keep on exhorting them, for exhortation benefits the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And admonish, for verily admonition profiteth the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And admonish, for admonition indeed benefits the faithful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But teach (thy Message) for teaching benefits the Believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And remind (by preaching the Quran, O Muhammad SAW) for verily, the reminding profits the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: But remind, the Reminder will benefit the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And remind, for the reminder benefits the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And remind, for indeed, the reminder benefits the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [51:55] And remind, admonish by the Qur’ān, for reminding truly benefits believers, [these being] those whom God knows that they will believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And warn) admonish by means of the Qur'an, (for warning) admonition by means of the Qur'an (proflteth believers) increases the righteousness of the believers. 614
